name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Technical Solutions Engineer specializing in intralogistics solutions with a solid background in data analysis and technical design. Adept at developing automated storage systems, conveyor systems, and sorting systems that enhance material transport solutions by leveraging comprehensive market analysis and negotiation skills. Bringing 13+ years of experience in the software domain with a strong capability in customer service and business development.
Full Stack skills include hands-on expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside a robust tech stack that features **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for both frontend and backend development. Proven experience in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices architectures, and enhancing CI/CD pipelines. Developed AI/ML-powered platforms to bolster predictive analytics and real-time processing capabilities, with significant experience in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to compliance-driven development by aligning solutions with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
